product_name: REI Key and Combination Cable Lock
long_description: The REI Key and Combination Cable Lock secures your luggage zippers and allows easy access for security screeners. Flexible cable makes threading easy and set includes both combo and key locks. Includes flexible, coated stainless steel 70mm cable, resettable 3-dial combination and 2 keys. Lock is recognized and accepted by the Transportation Security Administration (TSA).
short_description: The REI Key and Combination Cable Lock secures your luggage zippers and allows easy access for security screeners. Flexible cable makes threading easy and set includes both combo and key locks.
